snippet.title: Backpack Hero Trailer – PC & Consoles
snippet.description:
Coming soon to Xbox, PlayStation and Nintendo Switch!
Collect rare items, organize your bag, and vanquish your foes! 
Backpack Hero is a twist on your standard deck-building roguelike. It isn't just about what you carry, but how you organize the items in your bag. Their placement has a huge effect on their power.
With over 180,000 players, Backpack Hero offers a compelling departure from traditional deck-building roguelikes.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1970580/Backpack_Hero/
Join Backpack Hero Discord: https://discord.gg/rz6wXwpWMw
Visit our website: https://differenttales.com/
